details.title: 1.1 Fill in the blanks with the correct form of verbs
details.instructions: come, get, happen, look, make, start, try, work, stay

questions.text: "You're working hard today." "Yes, I have a lot to do."
I _____ for Christine. Do you know where she is?
It _____ dark. Shall I turn on the light?

details.title: 1.2 Complete the sentences with appropriate words

questions.text: Why _____ at me like that? What's the matter?
